simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function generates an event that displays the application version numbers.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function resets the FM housekeeping telemetry counters.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

detaileddescription.para:
Description
This function copies the command specified source file to the command specified target file. Because of the possibility that this command might take a very long time to complete, command argument validation will be done immediately but copying the file will be performed by a lower priority child task. As such, the return value for this function only refers to the result of command argument verification and being able to place the command on the child task interface queue.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function moves the command specified source file to the command specified target filename.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function renames the command specified source file to the command specified target filename.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function deletes the command specified file.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

briefdescription.para: Delete All Files Command Handler Function.

detaileddescription.para:
Description
This function deletes all files from the command specified directory. Because of the possibility that this command might take a very long time to complete, command argument validation will be done immediately but reading the directory and deleting each file will be performed by a lower priority child task. As such, the return value for this function only refers to the result of command argument verification and being able to place the command on the child task interface queue.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

detaileddescription.para:
Description
This function decompresses the command specified source file into the command specified target file. Because of the possibility that this command might take a very long time to complete, command argument validation will be done immediately but decompressing the source file into the target file will be performed by a lower priority child task. As such, the return value for this function only refers to the result of command argument verification and being able to place the command on the child task interface queue.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

detaileddescription.para:
Description
This function concatenates two command specified source files into the command specified target file. Because of the possibility that this command might take a very long time to complete, command argument validation will be done immediately but copying the first source file to the target file and then appending the second source file to the target file will be performed by a lower priority child task. As such, the return value for this function only refers to the result of command argument verification and being able to place the command on the child task interface queue.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

briefdescription.para: Get File Information Command Handler Function.

detaileddescription.para:
Description
This function creates a telemetry packet and populates the packet with the current information regarding the command specified file. Because of the possibility that this command might take a very long time to complete, command argument validation will be done immediately but collecting the status data and calculating the CRC will be performed by a lower priority child task. As such, the return value for this function only refers to the result of command argument verification and being able to place the command on the child task interface queue.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

briefdescription.para: Get Open Files List Command Handler Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function creates a telemetry packet and populates it with a list of the current open files.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function creates the command specified directory.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function deletes the command specified directory.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

briefdescription.para: Get Directory List to Packet Command Handler Function.

detaileddescription.para:
Description
This function creates an output file and writes a listing of the command specified directory to the file. Because of the possibility that this command might take a very long time to complete, command argument validation will be done immediately but reading the directory will be performed by a lower priority child task. As such, the return value for this function only refers to the result of command argument verification and being able to place the command on the child task interface queue.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

briefdescription.para: Get Directory List to Packet Command Handler Function.

detaileddescription.para:
Description
This function creates a telemetry packet and populates the packet with the directory listing data for the command specified directory, starting at the command specified directory entry. Because of the possibility that this command might take a very long time to complete, command argument validation will be done immediately but reading the directory will be performed by a lower priority child task. As such, the return value for this function only refers to the result of command argument verification and being able to place the command on the child task interface queue.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

briefdescription.para: Get Free Space Command Handler Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function creates a telemetry packet and populates the packet with free space data for each file system listed in the FM File System Free Space Table.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

briefdescription.para: Set Table Entry State Command Handler Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function modifies the enable/disable state for a single entry in the File System Free Space Table.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.

briefdescription.para: Set File Permissions of a file.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is a direct call to OS_chmod to set the file access

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to Software Bus command packet.
